Class VertexAdapter

java.lang.Object
au.edu.anu.twapps.mm.layout.VertexAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
IVertex
Direct Known Subclasses:
FRVertex, TreeVertexAdapter
public abstract class VertexAdapter extends Object implements IVertex
Author:
Ian Davies 30 Apr 2020

Adapter for vertices with just position information.
